name: CHAINCRISIS
detail:
Introduction
Chain Crisis is a Cyberpunk MMORPG on the Solana blockchain, like world of warcraft meets Blade Runner. team up and defeat strong enemies to get CREDS(Game currency and equipment).
Gameplay
3 working steps of the game: customization, battle and claim. Defeat waves of enemies and bosses by following the given missions. form long-term partnerships with other players through Syndicates. Claim CREDS and in-game loot from DAT(Decentralized Autonomous Treasury.
